Quote.Author: Kim Cattrall
Quote.QuoteValue: In my life and career I want to embrace ageing because I think that's what's interesting

Quote.Author: Kim Cattrall
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been dieting my whole life because I have a tremendous appetite

Quote.Author: Kim Gordon
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone becomes mannered if you think too much about what other people think

Quote.Author: Kim Gordon
Quote.QuoteValue: It's amazing how many things you can do when you're just pretending

Quote.Author: Kim Gordon
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone's so interior now, they're not really looking around them. They're on their phones

Quote.Author: Kim Gordon
Quote.QuoteValue: I just happened to start playing music for the conceptual ideas

Quote.Author: Kim Gordon
Quote.QuoteValue: I try not to think too much about what the audience is thinking and what they think I should do

Quote.Author: Kim Gordon
Quote.QuoteValue: It's really hard for me to sing and play bass

Quote.Author: Kim Gordon
Quote.QuoteValue: Rap music is really good when you're traumatized

Quote.Author: Kim Gordon
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I think fashion is more of a conversation between men than it is for women

Quote.Author: Kim Gordon
Quote.QuoteValue: I never thought about doing anything other than making art

Quote.Author: Kim Gordon
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the adrenaline of playing improv - it makes me feel really calm

Quote.Author: Kimbal Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: Our family are all very hard working

Quote.Author: Kimbal Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: Boulder should be next to the word 'community' in the dictionary

Quote.Author: Kimbal Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: Nikola Tesla spent one of his most productive years in Colorado Springs

Quote.Author: Kimbal Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: I was very afraid of failure because if you fail at something you love, then you ruin what you love

Quote.Author: Kimbal Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: Users are open to ads as long as they're relevant to their realtime experience

Quote.Author: Kimbal Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: The idea behind fast food is great - people want convenience

Quote.Author: Kimbal Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: Start with the young, work with them until they are adults, and they will demand real food

Quote.Author: Kimbal Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: Kids gave Elon a very hard time, and it had a huge impact on his life

Quote.Author: Kimbal Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: Food is the new Internet

Quote.Author: Kimbal Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: The Kitchen's mission is to strengthen communities by bringing local, real food to everyone

Quote.Author: Kimberly Guilfoyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Work hard. Through determination and self-focus and discipline, you can accomplish anything

Quote.Author: Kimberly Guilfoyle
Quote.QuoteValue: If you put your mind to it, anything is possible

Quote.Author: Kimberly Guilfoyle
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to be inclusive

Quote.Author: Kimberly Guilfoyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Continual, intentional, or snarky putdowns have no place in a healthy relationship

Quote.Author: Kimberly Guilfoyle
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoyed giving back to the city I was born and raised in

Quote.Author: Kimberly Guilfoyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Sure, our legal system has its flaws, but it is the best legal system in the world

Quote.Author: Kimberly Guilfoyle
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a strong woman. I come from a background as a prosecutor

Quote.Author: Kimberly Guilfoyle
Quote.QuoteValue: I can never resist the good stuff: salami, pepperoni, you name it. I love it all

Quote.Author: Kimberly Guilfoyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone loves to feast their eyes on Times Square on New Year's Eve

Quote.Author: Kimberly Guilfoyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Roger Ailes, he's incredible. He's the one that created 'The Five' and came up with the idea for it

Quote.Author: Kimora Lee Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: My family is the most important thing to me

Quote.Author: Kimora Lee Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a girl's girl. I'm a woman's woman. I'm a cool girl

Quote.Author: Kimora Lee Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: I try not to be neurotic; I try to create and present healthy body image

Quote.Author: Kimora Lee Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: You can never control other people. You can only control yourself. I have definitely learned that

Quote.Author: Kimora Lee Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not always about the money and the fame, and a lot of people think that it is sometimes

Quote.Author: Kimora Lee Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a really big mouth, I have a lot of opinions and I will be heard

Quote.Author: Kimora Lee Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: Fabulosity. It's a state of being

Quote.Author: Kimora Lee Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: Yes, I'm quirky, loud and crazy

Quote.Author: Kimora Lee Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: For me it's always God, family, and then my work

Quote.Author: Kimora Lee Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm lucky, always hopeful... I love my life

Quote.Author: King Solomon
Quote.QuoteValue: A friend loveth at all times, and a brother is born for adversity

Quote.Author: King Solomon
Quote.QuoteValue: All the rivers run into the sea; yet the sea is not full

Quote.Author: King Solomon
Quote.QuoteValue: Kindness and faithfulness keep a king safe, through kindness his throne is made secure

Quote.Author: King Solomon
Quote.QuoteValue: As iron sharpens iron, so a friend sharpens a friend

Quote.Author: King Solomon
Quote.QuoteValue: Your own soul is nourished when you are kind; it is destroyed when you are cruel

Quote.Author: King Solomon
Quote.QuoteValue: A fool is wise in his eyes

Quote.Author: King Solomon
Quote.QuoteValue: A good name is rather to be chosen than riches

Quote.Author: King Solomon
Quote.QuoteValue: A merry heart maketh a cheerful countenance

Quote.Author: King Solomon
Quote.QuoteValue: In the day of prosperity be joyful, but in the day of adversity consider

Quote.Author: King Solomon
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not rebuke mockers, or they will hate you; rebuke the wise, and they will love you

Quote.Author: Kinky Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: Money can buy you a fine dog, but only love can make him wag his tail

Quote.Author: Kinky Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty is in the eye of the beer holder

Quote.Author: Kinky Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: You struggle with your demons and you conquer them

Quote.Author: Kinky Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics is the only field in which the more experience you have, the worse you get

Quote.Author: Kinky Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: Remember: Y'all is singular. All y'all is plural. All y'all's is plural possessive

Quote.Author: Kinky Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to pretend that your life is a financial pleasure even when your autographs are bouncing

Quote.Author: Kinky Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: I admit to drinking it, but I did not swallow

Quote.Author: Kinky Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm too young for Medicare and too old for women to care

Quote.Author: Kinky Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: How can you look at the Texas legislature and still believe in intelligent design?

Quote.Author: Kinky Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't apologize to people who try to intimidate

Quote.Author: Kirby Smart
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very important that we don't make the same mistakes twice. That's a big part of improvement

Quote.Author: Kirby Smart
Quote.QuoteValue: At the end of the day, you have to go out on the grass and perform

Quote.Author: Kirby Smart
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big believer in your offensive limitations come from your quarterback

Quote.Author: Kirby Smart
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing worse than recruiting a player and then leaving the player

Quote.Author: Kirby Smart
Quote.QuoteValue: What you have success with, you feel comfortable with, you always rely on that a little bit

Quote.Author: Kirby Smart
Quote.QuoteValue: When you talk about the SEC, you never get a chance to rest

Quote.Author: Kirby Smart
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't recruit against Nick Saban. I recruit for the University of Georgia

Quote.Author: Kirby Smart
Quote.QuoteValue: My family's so happy in Tuscaloosa. My wife loves it

Quote.Author: Kirby Smart
Quote.QuoteValue: I moved seven times the first seven years I coached

Quote.Author: Kirby Smart
Quote.QuoteValue: I could finish my career being a defensive coordinator and say, 'Hey, he's Mickey Andrews.'

Quote.Author: Kirk Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that freedom of speech and freedom of religion go hand-in-hand in America

Quote.Author: Kirk Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: I love all people; I hate no one

Quote.Author: Kirk Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: It does grieve me to think there are people misunderstanding my heart on an issue

Quote.Author: Kirk Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not perfect in my walk but I want to do the right thing

Quote.Author: Kirk Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: I could have anything I wanted and if I didn't have it, it was because I didn't want it

Quote.Author: Kirk Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: Do I support the idea of gay marriage? No, I don't

Quote.Author: Kirk Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, God comes first, my family come second. If I fail at those two, I'm just playing games

Quote.Author: Kirk Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: If my kid came to me and said 'I'm gay,' I'd say, 'Son, I love you.'

Quote.Author: Kirk Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: Our first priority is our kids

Quote.Author: Kirk Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: God's advice trumps Oprah's every time

Quote.Author: Kirk Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: Love has more depth as you get older

Quote.Author: Kirk Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: The learning process continues until the day you die

Quote.Author: Kirk Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't start out to be a movie star. I started out to be an actor

Quote.Author: Kirk Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: In order to achieve anything you must be brave enough to fail

Quote.Author: Kirk Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to know about a man you can find out an awful lot by looking at who he married

Quote.Author: Kirk Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess I was a bad boy... Yes, yes, I've had lots of women in my life

Quote.Author: Kirk Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't think I was so tough until I did 'Champion'; then I was a tough guy

Quote.Author: Kirk Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: Why can't a woman be more like a dog, huh? So sweet, loving, attentive

Quote.Author: Kirk Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: I came from abject poverty. There was nowhere to go but up

Quote.Author: Kirk Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: Acting is a youthful profession

Quote.Author: Kirk Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: My guitars are my umbilical cord. They're directly wired into my head

Quote.Author: Kirk Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: A life lived unexplored is a life not worth living

Quote.Author: Kirk Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: Just because you know umpteen billion scales, it doesn't mean you have to use them all in a solo

Quote.Author: Kirk Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's morally wrong to keep someone away from what keeps him happy

Quote.Author: Kirk Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it goes without saying that a lot of big horror fans are just nerds and geeks

Quote.Author: Kirk Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been into horror movies ever since I was five years old

Quote.Author: Kirk Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: If a guitar is too easy for me to play, it makes me too laid back. I like to battle with my guitar

Quote.Author: Kirk Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: Guitar playing is both extremely easy for me and extremely difficult for me at the same time

Quote.Author: Kirk Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone has a side to them that's kind of unexplained and feels misunderstood

Quote.Author: Kirk Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: I love 'True Blood.' I love 'The Walking Dead.' Those are fantastic series

Quote.Author: Kirsten Dunst
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very mature for my age, but I'm also innocent in a lot of ways

Quote.Author: Kirsten Dunst
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't try to be sexy, but if you are sexy it comes out. If you're not, you're not

Quote.Author: Kirsten Dunst
Quote.QuoteValue: When you feel good is when you're not afraid to feel the worst

Quote.Author: Kirsten Dunst
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to get an angel wings tatooed on my back, as a guardian thing

Quote.Author: Kirsten Dunst
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to grow up and be beautiful. I know it doesn't matter, but it doesn't hurt

Quote.Author: Kirsten Dunst
Quote.QuoteValue: Confidence is very sexy. You could be not cute at all and have such confidence

Quote.Author: Kirsten Dunst
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to be a good friend to people, that's all

Quote.Author: Kirsten Dunst
Quote.QuoteValue: You can never get enough of 'Jeopardy.'

Quote.Author: Kirsten Dunst
Quote.QuoteValue: I never read comics as a kid. I guess I was lazy and watched cartoons instead

Quote.Author: Kirsten Dunst
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't find I'm manic at all. I'm very chill

Quote.Author: Kirstie Alley
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe you have to have eating disorders and mental illness to screw up

Quote.Author: Kirstie Alley
Quote.QuoteValue: My food demons are Chinese food, sugar, butter

Quote.Author: Kirstie Alley
Quote.QuoteValue: I never did go back to acting class. I was too busy working

Quote.Author: Kirstie Alley
Quote.QuoteValue: There's always somebody older, richer, more desperate than you

Quote.Author: Kirstie Alley
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a lot more to life than how fat or thin you are

Quote.Author: Kirstie Alley
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter what parents do, kids retain their uniqueness

Quote.Author: Kirstie Alley
Quote.QuoteValue: I probably spend more time with my kids than the average stay-at-home mother

Quote.Author: Kirstie Alley
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't smoke pot. I never liked it

Quote.Author: Kirstie Alley
Quote.QuoteValue: I couldn't care less about sex unless I meet someone who I think is wonderful

Quote.Author: Kirstie Alley
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been irresponsible many, many, many times and that has resulted in my being fat

Quote.Author: Klaus Kinski
Quote.QuoteValue: One should judge a man mainly from his depravities. Virtues can be faked. Depravities are real

Quote.Author: Klaus Kinski
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't need anybody to tell me how to be alive

Quote.Author: Klaus Kinski
Quote.QuoteValue: People who do not see the terrible things therefore do not see the beautiful things, either

Quote.Author: Klaus Kinski
Quote.QuoteValue: The ultimate acting is to destroy yourself

Quote.Author: Klaus Kinski
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't need a framework. You need a painting, not a frame

Quote.Author: Klaus Kinski
Quote.QuoteValue: You leap over the wall of one ghetto and find yourself in another ghetto

Quote.Author: Klaus Kinski
Quote.QuoteValue: It is the Nobel Prize I want. It's worth $400,000

Quote.Author: Klaus Kinski
Quote.QuoteValue: Fun? There is no fun

Quote.Author: Klaus Kinski
Quote.QuoteValue: Where a beast would have claws, I was born with talent

Quote.Author: Klaus Kinski
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not the Jesus of the official church tolerated by those in power. I am not your superstar

Quote.Author: Knute Rockne
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm getting sick and tired of doing anything half-way

Quote.Author: Knute Rockne
Quote.QuoteValue: Win or lose, do it fairly

Quote.Author: Knute Rockne
Quote.QuoteValue: A coach's greatest asset is his sense of responsibility - the reliance placed on him by his players

Quote.Author: Knute Rockne
Quote.QuoteValue: Show me a good and gracious loser and I'll show you a failure

Quote.Author: Knute Rockne
Quote.QuoteValue: One man practicing sportsmanship is far better than a hundred teaching it

Quote.Author: Knute Rockne
Quote.QuoteValue: Drink the first. Sip the second slowly. Skip the third

Quote.Author: Knute Rockne
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's win one for the Gipper

Quote.Author: Knute Rockne
Quote.QuoteValue: Build up your weaknesses until they become your strong points

Quote.Author: Knute Rockne
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no need for me continuing unless I'm able to improve

Quote.Author: Knute Rockne
Quote.QuoteValue: Play like you're positive on the victory, even though they're leading big now

Quote.Author: Kodi Smi
Quote.QuoteValue: cPhee - When I know I'm not doing any auditions, I go to the skate park on my scooter or my bike

Quote.Author: Kodi Smi
Quote.QuoteValue: cPhee - I really like driving cars. I love car games

Quote.Author: Kodi Smi
Quote.QuoteValue: cPhee - My friends in Australia, they grew up with me acting, so they're used to it

Quote.Author: Kodi Smi
Quote.QuoteValue: cPhee - I thought that 'Twilight' would be a kind of girl movie, but it was cool

Quote.Author: Kodi Smi
Quote.QuoteValue: cPhee - In L.A., I live right across from Universal Studios

Quote.Author: Kodi Smi
Quote.QuoteValue: cPhee - Vampires used to be like Dracula, and now they're young teenage kids, so yeah, I like that

Quote.Author: Kodi Smi
Quote.QuoteValue: cPhee - Interviews are fun, but I get nervous at red carpets

Quote.Author: Kodi Smi
Quote.QuoteValue: cPhee - I like animation: you can go to work in your pyjamas

Quote.Author: Kodi Smi
Quote.QuoteValue: cPhee - My favorite genre is comedy

Quote.Author: Kodi Smi
Quote.QuoteValue: cPhee - My dad teaches me. He teaches me everything. He's been acting for over 30 years, so he knows a lot

Quote.Author: Kourtney Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm proof that, even after having a baby, you can look better and sexier than ever!

Quote.Author: Kourtney Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: When every moment is constantly being filmed, it's hard to relax

Quote.Author: Kourtney Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: I have had breast implants, but it's so funny 'cause it's not a secret; I could care less

Quote.Author: Kourtney Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I just wish nobody knew who I was

Quote.Author: Kourtney Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion is so subjective, and I think it should be playful

Quote.Author: Kourtney Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: My daily style is easy and effortless - I don't like to take too much time getting ready

Quote.Author: Kourtney Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: I love being pregnant in general

Quote.Author: Kourtney Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: After my daughter was born, I made a promise to myself to live in the moment

Quote.Author: Kourtney Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: Mom always told us to wear pretty, matching underwear

Quote.Author: Kourtney Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: I think motherhood is just about instinct

Quote.Author: Kris Kristofferson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can't get out of something, get into it

Quote.Author: Kris Kristofferson
Quote.QuoteValue: If God made anything better than women, I think he kept it for himself

Quote.Author: Kris Kristofferson
Quote.QuoteValue: If God made anything better than women, he kept it for himself

Quote.Author: Kris Kristofferson
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom's just another word for nothing left to lose

Quote.Author: Kris Kristofferson
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing ain't worth nothing but it's free

Quote.Author: Kris Kristofferson
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom is just another word: It seems to get truer the older I get

Quote.Author: Kris Kristofferson
Quote.QuoteValue: Johnny Cash has always been larger than life

Quote.Author: Kris Kristofferson
Quote.QuoteValue: I boxed in Golden Gloves at Oxford and still know how to throw a straight left jab

Quote.Author: Kris Kristofferson
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never forgotten a single record I cut or a song I wrote

Quote.Author: Kris Kristofferson
Quote.QuoteValue: The one thing I regret is missing the time with my older children when they were young

Quote.Author: Kristaps Porzingis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll keep growing as a player, keep working out, trying to become what I want to become

Quote.Author: Kristaps Porzingis
Quote.QuoteValue: For the triangle to really work, everybody needs to be on the same page and know how to play it

Quote.Author: Kristaps Porzingis
Quote.QuoteValue: I love New York

Quote.Author: Kristaps Porzingis
Quote.QuoteValue: No one's comfortable with losing

Quote.Author: Kristaps Porzingis
Quote.QuoteValue: A good team needs time to play together

Quote.Author: Kristaps Porzingis
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody wants to be losing, especially in New York. It's extremely tough. That's how it is

Quote.Author: Kristaps Porzingis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really focused on getting better as a player

Quote.Author: Kristaps Porzingis
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Barcelona. Barcelona is a very, very nice city

Quote.Author: Kristaps Porzingis
Quote.QuoteValue: I love playing ping pong

Quote.Author: Kristaps Porzingis
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to eat as healthy as possible and try to put some weight on

Quote.Author: Kristen Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: I am quite shy and people think I'm aloof

Quote.Author: Kristen Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: It's okay', you know? It's okay to be you. It's okay to just not be okay. It's okay to not be okay

Quote.Author: Kristen Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: I never expected that this would be my life

Quote.Author: Kristen Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: I want a cheeseburger so badly, but I have to be a vampire in a few weeks

Quote.Author: Kristen Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: I think romance is anything honest. As long as it's honest, it's so disarming

Quote.Author: Kristen Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: Girls are scary. Large groups of girls scare the crap out of me

Quote.Author: Kristen Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: I would never cheapen my relationships by talking about them

Quote.Author: Kristen Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: When I dress up, I have to have a lot of help. I was in a T-shirt until a few minutes ago

Quote.Author: Kristen Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always had an aversion to looking sexy, but I've grown out of it

Quote.Author: Kristen Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: My best friend just had a baby, and she's my age. So I'm a godmom now, which is crazy

Quote.Author: Kristen Wiig
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the rain. It's my favorite weather

Quote.Author: Kristen Wiig
Quote.QuoteValue: I really, really want to go to Paris. I've never been

Quote.Author: Kristen Wiig
Quote.QuoteValue: The weddings that I've been in have been pretty mellow

Quote.Author: Kristen Wiig
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe studios don't want to see women acting in a way that isn't womanly. Maybe people don't

Quote.Author: Kristen Wiig
Quote.QuoteValue: I hated speaking in public. I would miss school just so I wouldn't have to do it

Quote.Author: Kristen Wiig
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not as much a history person as an art person, but I mean, you can read history through art

Quote.Author: Kristen Wiig
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy being characters rather than myself

Quote.Author: Kristen Wiig
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish I had a lot of tattoos

Quote.Author: Kristen Wiig
Quote.QuoteValue: There's something about a Christmas sweater that will always make me laugh

Quote.Author: Kristen Wiig
Quote.QuoteValue: Why can't there be a lot of great women who are doing great things?

Quote.Author: Kristi Yamaguchi
Quote.QuoteValue: My experience at the 1992 Winter Olympics was my fulfillment of dreaming the Impossible Dream

Quote.Author: Kristi Yamaguchi
Quote.QuoteValue: I burnt myself out of skating. I was ready to focus on being a mom

Quote.Author: Kristi Yamaguchi
Quote.QuoteValue: This experience has been once in a lifetime

Quote.Author: Kristi Yamaguchi
Quote.QuoteValue: I never wanted to feel I hadn't worked hard enough

Quote.Author: Kristi Yamaguchi
Quote.QuoteValue: Training for the Olympics was a lifelong endeavor and took many years

Quote.Author: Kristi Yamaguchi
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a perfectionist

Quote.Author: Kristi Yamaguchi
Quote.QuoteValue: Childhood reading is so important

Quote.Author: Kristi Yamaguchi
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had a lot more fun with the training

Quote.Author: Kristi Yamaguchi
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always looking for inspiring ways to stay motivated and stay active

Quote.Author: Kristi Yamaguchi
Quote.QuoteValue: The past couple years training with Kurt have really brought inspiration into my skating

Quote.Author: Kristian Nairn
Quote.QuoteValue: In all honesty, when you talk about 'the gay community,' you are talking about my community, haha

Quote.Author: Kristian Nairn
Quote.QuoteValue: With 'World of Warcraft,' I like the potential for wasting time

Quote.Author: Kristian Nairn
Quote.QuoteValue: I could never see myself playing a goblin or gnome, without some serious CGI at least!

Quote.Author: Kristian Nairn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a massive 'WoW' nerd, and gamer in general

Quote.Author: Kristian Nairn
Quote.QuoteValue: Of course I have had thoughts about going into politics

Quote.Author: Kristian Nairn
Quote.QuoteValue: It's an actor's dream to only have one line, and people like him, so I'm really lucky

Quote.Author: Kristian Nairn
Quote.QuoteValue: I love saying 'Hodor!'

Quote.Author: Kristian Nairn
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a kid, I was obsessed with Thor. I had a hammer

Quote.Author: Kristian Nairn
Quote.QuoteValue: I really wasted a lot of time in my 20s

Quote.Author: Kristian Nairn
Quote.QuoteValue: I really know what it's like to work and live every moment now, and I'm really grateful for that

Quote.Author: Kristin Cavallari
Quote.QuoteValue: I would never put my close friends or a real relationship on a show

Quote.Author: Kristin Cavallari
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big fan of Kate Moss's style - no-one nails boho meets hippy chic like she does

Quote.Author: Kristin Cavallari
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing you see on TV is real

Quote.Author: Kristin Cavallari
Quote.QuoteValue: My personal style can be everything from girly and flirty to edgy and chic

Quote.Author: Kristin Cavallari
Quote.QuoteValue: I think a lot of girls look up to me because I'm a strong woman

Quote.Author: Kristin Cavallari
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't shop online. I'm always scared to put my credit card on the Internet!

Quote.Author: Kristin Cavallari
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very difficult to change the perception people have of you

Quote.Author: Kristin Cavallari
Quote.QuoteValue: It's an unwritten rule - girl friends' boyfriends are off limits, even after they break up

Quote.Author: Kristin Cavallari
Quote.QuoteValue: I would love to have my own shoe line. That I would absolutely love

Quote.Author: Kristin Cavallari
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very open to dating and finding a guy

Quote.Author: Kristin Chenoweth
Quote.QuoteValue: Apples, grapes... any kind of fruit gives me the energy I need to get through my busy day

Quote.Author: Kristin Chenoweth
Quote.QuoteValue: A nice pair of Jimmy Choos never hurt anyone

Quote.Author: Kristin Chenoweth
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a wild lady. Not

Quote.Author: Kristin Chenoweth
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a Christian and I don't want there to be any confusion about what I believe or who I am

Quote.Author: Kristin Chenoweth
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be a Christian like Christ - loving and accepting of other people

Quote.Author: Kristin Chenoweth
Quote.QuoteValue: I've finally graduated from 'I don't give a hoot.'

Quote.Author: Kristin Chenoweth
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a difference between making fun of something and having fun with something

Quote.Author: Kristin Chenoweth
Quote.QuoteValue: Oatmeal tastes so good on its own, you don't even need to add sugar

Quote.Author: Kristin Chenoweth
Quote.QuoteValue: We are what we eat, so I eat as many veggies as I can!

Quote.Author: Kristin Chenoweth
Quote.QuoteValue: It's in God's hands

Quote.Author: Kristin Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just grateful that my parents still love each other

Quote.Author: Kristin Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: I was one of those dorky kids who'd wanted to go to Harvard since the fifth grade

Quote.Author: Kristin Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the satire and skewering of comedy writing

Quote.Author: Kristin Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm allergic to caffeine. When I have it, my throat gets sore, and I get a rash

Quote.Author: Kristin Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: I can go days without meaningful human interaction

Quote.Author: Kristin Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: From age 7 on, I wanted to be a writer

Quote.Author: Kristin Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: I make things up for a living. It would be pretty boring to just fictionalize real people

Quote.Author: Kristin Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Jitterbug Perfume' is one of my favorite books
